ranked_diseases.explanation: Perfect match with reference cases showing identical phenotype constellation: intellectual disability, autistic behavior, macrodontia, and hand abnormalities. All three reference cases confirm this diagnosis.
Features intellectual disability, autistic behavior, and hand abnormalities (particularly hypoplastic fifth digits). Lacks typical macrodontia but shares significant overlap with presented phenotype.
Presents with intellectual disability, autistic behavior, and limb abnormalities. Macrodontia is not typical but dental anomalies can occur. Strong behavioral phenotype overlap.
Features intellectual disability, autistic behaviors, and characteristic hand abnormalities (broad thumbs/hallux). Dental anomalies including talon cusps occur but macrodontia is less common.
Includes intellectual disability, autism spectrum behaviors, and skeletal abnormalities of hands. Dental anomalies are reported but macrodontia specifically is rare.
